About LearningSceneJS.org

SceneJS is an extensible WebGL-based 3D engine for rendering high-detail scenes for applications such as engineering, medicine and data visualisation.

Though it’s got a nice friendly API, don’t let that fool you - internally it’s optimised to death with things like scene compilation and GL state sorting. SceneJS is designed to eat long lists of draw calls for breakfast.

I’m Lindsay and I’ll be your author here while you figure out SceneJS. Hit me on twitter
